𓄇 𓃮 ≠ 𓄂 𓃬 𓃭 𒈤

Panther leopard ⋍ leo

𓍋 𓃀 𓃰 El'Phanter
𓍋 𓃀 𓃮 Leo Panther
𒆷 𒁍 la-bu Löwe lion

𓃀 𓅡 󴩟 𓃮 | leopard 󴩟 | le Pard <> Gepard
𓃀 𓅡 𓄿 𓄛 | leopard | Pfaurter LeParder Panther PawTier
𓃀 𓅡 𓄇 𓄛 | (leopard) skin | Perser(cat) > PELT Pelz Fell > wool 𓃀 𓅡 𓄿 | virility | Pfauer Power!

𓋁 𓃀 𓏲 𓄛 𓏪 | leopard |
𓍋 𓃀 𓇋 𓇋 𓄛 𓇗 | leopard | ꜣby šmꜥ

𒉏𒊒 nim-ru 𒊊𒌉 nemur נִמְרָא nimrā 𓃮 “leopard” 𓌳 𓅱 𓃬 •nwmrw

Nimrod, der Nehmer "the Hunter"

E24 𓃮 'Phantier panther panter al'eoPhant leopard fangTier hunTier

𓃮 ≈ 𓃬

𒊊 lābu : Löwe, lion

𓃮 LeoPant 𓃀 𓅡 󴩟 𓃮 LeoPard 𓃭𓏤𓇋𓏏𓂢 L'Panther 𓍋 𓃀 𓃮 @ Levante®

𒉈𒋗 pil-šu parthu lion, breach

𒉈𒋗 pil-šu < •pard
𒉈𒋗 breach, lion

𓃮 pard ≈ proto 𓄂 𓃬 𓃭 𒈤 "before" 𒈤𒊑 maḫ-ri™ 𓅓 𓄂 𓏏 𓏤

𓃮 ≈ 𒊊 power, virility also in Sumerian 𒊊𒅅 𒉈𒅅 !
